oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1946-12-20 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on December 20, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Dick Reinhart; Ann Bond; Oklahoma Songbirds; Jack Beasley; Lem Hawkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] / (0:18) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page open the show / (0:39) Opening theme and statements / (1:50) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (2:05) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Under The Yum Yum Tree" / (3:08) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:17) Dick Reinhart performs "The Utah Trail" / (5:30) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (6:27) Ann Bond performs "Chiquita" [unconfirmed] / (8:51) Hiram Higsby introduces the Oklahoma Songbirds / (8:59) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "When The Bloom Is On The Sage" / (10:52) Hiram Higsby introduces Jack Beasley / (11:12) Jack Beasley performs "I Wonder If You Feel The Way I Do" / (13:43) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (13:54) Lem Hawkins performs "Shell And Peanuts" [unconfirmed] / (14:28) Allan Page announces the show name, broadcasting company, and radio station
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: KOMA recording service document [handwritten] stored with transcription documents; Box 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Davis, Chuck; Reinhart, Dick; Bond, Ann; Beasley, Jack;
